body:
I have played avicus for a while, I have been kicked and warned but today when I joined it all came up again, the date was ages ago but I still got kicked .-.
Anyone know why?
body_tagged:
I have played avicus for a while, I have been kicked and warned but today when I joined it all came up again, the date was ages ago but I still got kicked .-.
Anyone know why?
title: Random Kicks and warnings

replies.body:
Hopefully you now know it's a glitch, and don't worry, the infractions will be appealed and removed eventually. (:

Since the question has been answered, I'm going to lock the thread, 

If you have any further questions regarding the update, you can always ask your peers or us. 

And here's just a little tip: you can post glitches on the Avicus Github, in case you find another one of these. 

Thanks! Have a good day :D
